handist.collections.dist

Class DistMapList<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.dist.AbstractDistCollection
      • handist.collections.dist.DistMap<K,List<V>>
        • handist.collections.dist.DistMapList<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of the key used in the DistMapList
    V - type of the elements contained in the lists to which the keys map
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DistMapList<K,V>
extends DistMap<K,List<V>>
    A Map data structure spread over the multiple places. This class allows multiple values for one key.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • putAtSync

        public void putAtSync(K key,
                      V value,
                      apgas.Place pl,
                      MoveManagerLocal mm)
        Request that the specified value be put in the list of the given key on the specified place when the method MoveManagerLocal.sync() of the specified MoveManagerLocal instance is called.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the list.
        value - the value to be added to the mapping of key
        pl - the destination place
        mm - MoveManagerLocal handling the data transfers

      • map

        public <W> DistMapList<K,W> map(BiFunction<K,V,W> op)
        Apply the same operation on each element including remote places and creates a new DistMapList with the same keys as this instance and the result of the mapping operation as values.
        Type Parameters:
        W - the type of the result of the map operation
        Parameters:
        op - the mapping operation from V to W
        Returns:
        a new DistMapList which consists of the result of the operation.
